Some new features on Mubert! Now you can choose both genres and activities. Just swipe screens with options. The genres will be updated with new experimental music by Mubert AI in collaboration with worldwide artists.

Some new features on Mubert! Now you can choose both genres and activities. Just swipe screens with options. The genres will be updated with new experimental music by Mubert AI in collaboration with worldwide artists.

Mubert comes around with completely new features. In recent months, dozens of underground artists have entered the Mubert® Pro platform and created new generative streams, investing their unique sounds in the Mubert algorithm. We constantly work to improve the quality of our content and sound, and always read and take into consideration all of your comments.

With this update we are to monetize our application for the first time, introducing three new paid channels: ‘Meditate’, ‘High’ and ‘Dream’. Enjoy the premium content created exclusively for paid channels, available by subscription for $0.99/mo each.

From now on, we will be releasing new content on a regular basis, both in paid and free channels. So, do not forget to enable the push-notifications’ function, in order not to miss the special releases.

Your participation is very important for us, so please feel free to leave comments below, considering the features you wish to see in future updates of Mubert.

Together with you, we are creating a new consumer society of generative music and the future of the music industry.

Major audio player update: a new buffering algorithm has been implemented. The uninterrupted audio stream has been increased. Request to listeners in the case of improving the quality of the audio to leave feedback and write your experience on the new sound.

From now on, we will be releasing new content on a regular basis, both in paid and free channels. So, do not forget to enable the push-notifications’ function, in order not to miss the special releases.

Together with you, we are creating a new consumer society of generative music and the future of the music industry.

Guys, due to a technical error, we are forced to roll back the application to a stable version.
We are preparing the largest update ever. Follow the news in our social publics.

Guys, due to a technical error, we are forced to roll back the application to a stable version.
We are preparing the largest update ever. Follow the news in our social publics.

Global Update: This new version of Mubert marks the start of a new era, ruled by music. We have added several unique features to help you customise and manage the generative music Mubert creates.

NEW INTERFACE

- Redesigned visual player with user-friendly, intuitive controls
- "Daily" channel added - this new channel is updated daily with fresh generative streams created by producers from all over the world
- "Experimental" and "Secret" channels added
- Now you can easily share your favourite moments of streams to your friends and followers on social networks

PS. Make sure you have push-notifications enabled to receive updates on new releases by our producers, and find codes to unlock "Secret" channels.

PERSONALISATION

Now you can register for an account with Mubert. Signing up for an account allows you to personalise the music Mubert creates for you:

- Use the Like / Dislike buttons to teach the algorithm of your musical preferences
- The «Loop" function allows you to set up a "loop" of the stream at any particular moment you like, without interrupting the music

PREMIUM FUNCTIONS

Mubert’s subscription options have also been changed. Now you can gain access to all of the app’s functions simply by singing up to a monthly or yearly subscription.

- Intensity slider helps find music to match your mood/activity. There are three intensity options: Light, Medium and Heavy.
- Full access to Mubert’s ever-growing pool of user-made samples
- No watermark on the photos and videos you share on social networks

We’d also like to thank you all for the excellent feedback, and excellent ratings we have received via the reviews you guys have left so far.

We are constantly striving to improve the quality of Mubert’s content and the generative music it creates. Rest assured that we always read, and take into account every piece of feedback we receive from our loyal users.

If you like Mubert, and the way we have implemented our app, please take the time to leave us a constructive review, and don’t forget to rate us highly in the App Store.

Mubert is set to revolutionise the way we consume music. Let’s change the future of the music industry together!

Thanks for your feedback, we constantly improve Mubert to deliver you the best and modern music app ever.
Updates:
* Facebook login now works better
* Fixed bugs and improved application stability

Thanks for your feedback, we constantly improve Mubert to deliver you the most modern music app ever.

Updates:

* The ‘copyright’ button now toggles watermark (on Premium)
* Minor errors that could lead to an unexpected application termination fixed
* Push notifications setting fixed
* Music launch boosted
* Artwork copyrights now support external links
* Stability improved
* Small bugs fixed

Updated subscription model
Much more music added - now we have 40 channels and 5 brand new categories: Focus, Sleep, Calm, Chill, Sports
New implementation of intensity feature - now our algorithm can filter out part of the instruments to make the melody sound less intensive
Fancy GIFs added to each channel
Faves titles changed
Other minor changes

Sleep timer.
Huge thanks for your reviews and feedback, they help us create unique music experiences for your every day!
What’s new in this version:
Sleep timer. If relaxing sounds help you fall asleep, you no longer need to worry about your phone playing music all night.
Set up a timer in one of Mubert’s Sleep channels to let the app know when to stop playback.
The music will gradually fade out over time before stopping, easing you and your beloved ones into sleep

Sleep timer.
Huge thanks for your reviews and feedback, they help us create unique music experiences for your every day!
What’s new in this version:
Sleep timer. If relaxing sounds help you fall asleep, you no longer need to worry about your phone playing music all night.
Set up a timer in one of Mubert’s Sleep channels to let the app know when to stop playback.
The music will gradually fade out over time before stopping, easing you and your beloved ones into sleep
